title: Transferring account back from Oceania to NA but can't use USD to buy RP?
body: I have an account (Not this one) in Oceania and have wanted to get it back to North America recently. I wanted to buy RP to pay for the transfer, but obviously my card was declined because the money is USD ($) and I cannot pay with that. Is there a way to buy RP for that account using USD on a card only valid in the US for an Oceania account?

replies.body:
Paypal should work, just link that card to paypal and it will convert the currency before passing to RIOT.

**There may be extra fee's this way. 1-2% i think
